name: Infiltration (itch) (hasen6)
description:
Game inspired by the 8 bit classic Joe Blade. You have to rescue the hostages, defeat the enemies and diffuse the bombs.

Instructions:

  • WASD to move and use the mouse to aim and fire. 
  • Right button aims and left button fires or you can just fire directly with left button if you don't want to aim first.
  • N to open the menu.
  • P to pause the game.

This is the first game I've ever made so if there are any issues please let me know in the comments. Also if you have an idea for a better name for the game then I'm all ears too.
